trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Morgan
There were 2 other sightings in Morgan on or around February 4th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw bright objects in the sky when I was taking photos of sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out back in my yard about sundown and was taking photos of the sky. I observed some brightness in my photos. I observed a couple of V shaped following each other. They were in the NE from me in the sky. I also turned South and took another photo and seen another object thay was extremely bright. The objects were unusual. One of the objects in the darker clouds ; it was descending downward under the other one. The one in the southernly sky was changing shape. I could see it clearly in the sky. I didnt know what it was. I then came in the house after watching them a little while and uploaded my photos and zoomed in on them . I saw triangular v shaped ufo with lights.The one in the south sky was changing shape with white bright lights. I was sort of frightened by these.It was getting dark at that time. My husband looked at the photos I just took ; he said what are those? My photos ; I took with a digital camera so they are far off . You have to zoom in on my photos.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
